item.title: Mount Ordeals
item.description: Diagram credit: https://game8.jp/ff14/507079 Encounter Info DPS Check Enrage Preparation Light Parties (Tank, Healer, Melee, Ranged in each) Clock spots (Supports cardinal, DPS intercardinal) Markers Strategy Reference Purgation This mechanic will happen multiple times throughout the fight, with different patterns to solve.
